text:
mod_dialup which is a consumer of ap_mpm_register_timed_callback crashes trying to lock a null r->invoke_mtx if it gets called back after an internal redirect:

<Directory /home/covener/SRC/httpd-trunk/built/htdocs/>
RewriteEngine on
RewriteRule ^index2.html$ /index.html [L]
ModemStandard V.92
</Directory>
creator: covener@gmail.com
